attributes.action: increase the points allocated to earnings required to qualify for HSMP renewal.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We are migrants under the Highly Skilled Migrant Program and we are required to renew our leave to remain after 2 years initial leave to remain in the UK. In order to renew our leave to remain, we need to demonstrate that we have earned a certain level of income in a year. For instance, 5 points is allocated to annual earnings of £16,000 - £17,999.

We would like the prime minister to increase the points allocated to earnings because of the time it takes to secure permanent employment that would generate the required earnings.
